fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
industry_forums: European Parliament Interest Group on Women Entrepreneurship
eu_initiatives: Gender Equality policies and related legislation, women entrepreneurship policies, SME-related legislation and policies, social inclusion and employment policies and legislation
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
WEP is an international non-profit organization representing women entrepreneurs across Europe. Based in Brussels, we strive to represent and be the voice of women entrepreneurs to the European Parliament, and to develop a solid dialogue with EU institutions and policy makers. 
 
WEP counts over 10 women's organizations from across Europe as its members and we are the Secretariat for the EU Interest Group on Women's Entrepreneurship at the European Parliament.
